name: Asterogue
description:
Available for Windows (below) and Android.

A turn-based "coffeebreak" roguelike* game with pixel art graphics and random procedurally generated levels. You discover a hollow asteroid filled with procedurally generated mines, facilities, alien creatures, and space-loot. Balance futuristic hand weapons, armour, chemicals, nanotech, medkits and food as you battle weird creatures from outer space.

*From Wikipedia:
"Roguelike is a subgenre of RPG games that are characterized by random level generation, turn-based gameplay, tile-based graphics, and permanent death of the player-character."

✓ Infinite random procedurally generated levels.
✓ Gorgeous 8-bit pixel art by Oryx.
✓ Descend through 17 unique and challenging levels.
✓ Battle futuristic aliens to gain XP and loot.
✓ Drink chemical beakers, use nanotech, collect weapons to level up.
✓ Carefully tuned controls for mobile interfaces.
✓ Authentic roguelike permadeath mechanic.

  This is a game dev speedrun! I have until the end of October 2020 to ship this sci fi roguelike. It's out on October 30th for Android and Windows.

Get the original sound track, a chiptune rendition of Holst's The Planets.
